alert.note: Alert for Haskell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Haskell County through 700 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jud, or near Rochester, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Weinert, O`brien, Jud and Us-277 Near The Haskell- Knox County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
